title: Bloomberg Markets: Sonos Unveils First Voice-Controlled Speaker
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sonos Unveils First Voice-Controlled Speaker
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Patrick Spence\u0010Chief Executive Officer\u0010Sonos \u0010Discussing launch of new smart speaker the Sonos One, that includes Amazon’s Alexa voice software for controlling music playback.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
